title: Taiwan's Close Watch on Hong Kong Protests
description: In this episode, Jude invites CSIS Director of the China Power Project Bonnie Glaser. They discuss how the ongoing events in Hong Kong are impacting Taiwan’s own relations with mainland China, as well as how the continued unrest can affect Taiwan’s presidential elections coming up in January 2020.
itunes:author: Center for Strategic and International Studies
